Questions.QuestionString: 1.  The fire detectors use the electro-pneumatic technology.
Answers: one loop electric conector
A sensing element and A responder assembly

Questions.QuestionString: Banks : Each Engine fire and overheat detector is made up of? (B1, B2)
Answers: A sensing element and electrical connector assembly.
A sensing element and responder assembly.
A loop and responder assembly

Questions.QuestionString: 2. funtion of CM:
Answers: The CM channels change the analog signals of the fire detectors into digital signals and send them to the related FPF application.
interface CMS 3 funtion

Questions.QuestionString: 3. when ENG FIRE P/B release out:
Answers: trigg warning and ENG shutdows
ENG Fire bottle discharge
arm the cartridge firing system of the bottles and isolate the engine from the possible fire sources (electrical, fuel,hydraulic, bleed air).

Questions.QuestionString: 4.  which is correct for ENG FIRE:
Answers: 4 CM : 1 cho each ENG, 1 cho APU, 1 cho cargo
3 CM: 1 cho each ENG. 1 cho APU/Main Landing Gear Bay
2 CM. 1 cho each ENG

Questions.QuestionString: 5.  push and hold P/B tren bang FIRE
Answers: check intergity bottle low presure indication system and quanlity cartridges squib
check intergity bottle low presure indication system, operation check fire extinguishing system
all above

Questions.QuestionString: 7. which sentes is correct for smoke detector:
Answers: 1 SDCU interface giua CIDS/SDF
2 SDF application one inside each CIDSdirector.
2 SDF application inside 2 CPIOM

Questions.QuestionString: 8. cac truong hop nao sau day thi cargo smoke warning trigger
Answers: 2 smoke detector trong 1 khoang hang detect smoke
cho 1 cap
A and B

Questions.QuestionString: 9. cau nao correct for cargo fire Extinguishing system :
Answers: 2 bottle the same
A high-rated fire-extinguisher bottle (bottle 1), A flow-metered fire-extinguisher bottle (bottle 2

Questions.QuestionString: 10. diverter valve in cargo fire Extinguishing:
Answers: shutter valve type, mechanical operates
, operates electric motor
Each diverter valve outlet has a cartridge with two squibs

Questions.QuestionString: Banks : Relate to Diverter Valve in the LDCC Fire Extinguishing, which answer corrected?(B1, B2)
Answers: Each Diverter Valve  outlet hasa cartridge with two squibs
Diverter Valve is Ball Valve type, actuation by Electrical actuator
Diverter Valve is shuttle Valve type, mechanical operation

Questions.QuestionString: 1. The Locations of fire detector on each engine are:
Answers: Engine core and pylon, FAN.
Engine core and pylon,Intermediate pressure compressor.
Engine core and pylon,Intermediate pressure compressor,FAN.

Questions.QuestionString: 2. How many fire extinguisher bottles on each engine:
3. The purpose of CM ( convertion module) is:
Answers: Change analog  signals of the fire detectors into digital signal.
Change digital signals of the fire detectors into analog  signal.
Change analog  signals of the fire detectors and send to AFDX NETWORK.

Questions.QuestionString: 4. How many FPF applications:
Answers: 2 applications are hosted in 2 CPIOM.
4 applications are hosted in 4 CPIOM.
1 application is hosted in 4 CPIOM.

Questions.QuestionString: 5. Each fire detector has:
Answers: A sensing element.
A responder assembly.
Both a and b.

Questions.QuestionString: 6. If there is a fire on engine ,the engine fire extinguishing  system is done by:
Answers: Automatic  by FPF application hosted in CPIOM.
Manual by crew action.
Both a and b.

Questions.QuestionString: 7. How to operate the engine fire extinguishing system:
Answers: Push the FIRE/ENGINE 1(2) P/BSW on fire panel.
Release the FIRE/ENGINE 1(2) P/BSW then Release the FIRE/ENGINE 1(2)/AGENT 1(2) P/BSW.
Release the FIRE/ENGINE 1(2) P/BSW then push the FIRE/ENGINE 1(2)/AGENT 1(2) P/BSW.

Questions.QuestionString: 8. DISCH light on FIRE/ENGINE 1(2)/AGENT 1(2) come on when:
Answers: Carry out fire test and FIRE/ENGINE 1(2)/AGENT 1(2) P/BSW is pushed.
FIRE/ENGINE 1(2)/AGENT 1(2) P/BSW is pushed.
Carry out fire test and low-presure signal come from a pressure switch.

Questions.QuestionString: 9. How many fire extinguisher bottles on APU:
10. How is apu fire extinguishing system working:
Answers: Automatically by FPF application hosted in CPIOM when AC in flight or Manual by action of crew.
Automatically by FPF application hosted in CPIOM in flight.
Automatically by FPF application hosted in CPIOM when AC on Ground or Manual by action of crew.

Questions.QuestionString: 11. The squibs of ENGINE and APU fire extinguishing are electrically energized by:
Answers: 115V AC busbar and hot bus.
28V DC Emer busbar and hot bus.
Hot bus.

Questions.QuestionString: 12. When push the Fire test P/BSW on FIRE control panel:
Answers: FIRE test of ENGINE 1(2) is done only.
FIRE test of APU and MLG BAY are done.
FIRE test of ENGINE 1(2),APU and MLG BAY are done .

Questions.QuestionString: 13. If MLG BAY FIRE is warning:
Answers: MLG BAY fire extinguishing system is automatically working by FPF application hosted in CPIOM.
MLG BAY fire extinguishing system is manually working by push AGENT P/BSW.
There is no fire extinguishing system for MLG BAY. Crew must follow checklist of Emergency Procedures.

Questions.QuestionString: 14. Smoke Dectection System is installed in:
Answers: The lavatories.
Cabin Crew Rest Compartment (CCRC) and Flight Crew Rest Compartment (FCRC).
All of aboves.

Questions.QuestionString: 15. DEU-B will supply the electrical to:
Answers: All smoke detector.
Only CCRC and FCRC smoke detector.
Only The lavatories smoke detector.

Questions.QuestionString: 16. The cabin and LAV fire extinguishing system (FES) has:
Answers: Portable fire extinguisher bottles in cabin and LAV.
Fire extinguisher bottles in waste bin of LAV and cabin.
Portable fire extinguisher bottles in cabin and Fire extinguisher bottles in waste bin of LAV.

Questions.QuestionString: 17.  How many fire extinguisher bottles on cargo:
18. DISCH light on AGENT TO FWD P/BSW on CARGO SMOKE Panel come on when:
Answers: low-presure signal come from a pressure switch of BOTTLE 1.
low-presure signal come from a pressure switch of BOTTLE 2.
AGENT TO FWD P/BSW is pressed in.

Questions.QuestionString: 1. Each Engine fire and overheat detector is made up of? (B1, B2)
Answers: A sensing element and electrical connector assembly.
A sensing element and responder assembly.
A loop and responder assembly

Questions.QuestionString: 2. To do the operational test of the APU Fire-Extinguishing System:(B1, B2)
Answers: The APU MASTER SW P/B must be push to ON.
No need to push ON APU MASTER SW.
Only push and hold the TEST P/B.

Questions.QuestionString: 3. What is warning when you do the operational test of the APU Fire-Extinguishing System?(B1, B2)
Answers: Do not release the APU fire p/b switch
Do not push the APU master SW p/b
Do not push the AGENT pushbutton switch while the APU fire p/b switch is released

Questions.QuestionString: 4. The function of the flow metering system of LDCC fire extinguishing is:(B1, B2)
Answers: Makes sure that the agent of bottle 1 is released slowly.
Makes sure that the agent of bottle 2 is released slowly.
Makes sure that the agent of bottle 1 & 2 are released slowly.

Questions.QuestionString: 5. Which the function of the diverter valve in the LDCC fire extinguishing(B1, B2)
Answers: Supplies the extinguishing agent from the two bottles to the FWD or the aft/bulk cargo compartment
Isolate the extinguishing agent between two bottles during discharge
Supply the extinguishing agent from FWD Bottle to FWD Cargo and AFT Bottle to Aft/Bulk Cargo

Questions.QuestionString: 6. Related to Extended Range Operations for Two-Engine Aeroplanes (ETOPS), which answer corrected?(A, B1, B2)
Answers: Size of the two fire extinguishing bottle different
Size of the fire extinguishing bottle 2 different
Not Related to fire extinguishing bottle

Questions.QuestionString: 7. Relate to Diverter Valve in the LDCC Fire Extinguishing, which answer corrected?(B1, B2)
Answers: Each Diverter Valve  outlet hasa cartridge with two squibs
Diverter Valve is Ball Valve type, actuation by Electrical actuator
Diverter Valve is shuttle Valve type, mechanical operation

Questions.QuestionString: 8. Which area in a/c to protect for Fire and Overheat? (A, B1, B2)
Answers: Engines, APU
Engines, APU, MLG Bay
Engines, APU, MLG Bay, Cabin, Cargo

Questions.QuestionString: 9. Which the Function of the Conversion Module? (A, B1, B2)
Answers: Change the analog signals to digital signals
Supply Electrical Power to Fire Loop
exchange data to monitor the fire detectors

Questions.QuestionString: 10. How to test smoke system?(A, B1, B2)
Answers: Perform test thought OMT
Push Smoke Test Pushbutton on Overhead panel
Both above

Questions.QuestionString: 11. Which one is controlled Smoke Detection System in Normal operation? (B1, B2)
Answers: SDF1 and SDF2 in operation the same time
SDF1 is in Operation and SDF2 in Standby
SDF1 is in Operation and SDF2 in Hot Standby

Questions.QuestionString: 12. How to reset a spurious Lavatory Smoke ? (B1, B2)
Answers: Reset SDS 1 and 2 On Overhead Panel
Reset SDF 1 and 2 on overhead panel
Reset SDS 1 and 2 on overhead panel or SMOKE Reset hardkey on FAP

Questions.QuestionString: 13. When you Push and Hold Fire Test Pushbutton on the overhead panel, on the FIRE section of panel 245VM, that mean?(A, B1, B2)
Answers: Operational check of MLG-BAY, APU and Engine Fire Protection System
Operational Check of APU or Engine Fire Protection System
Operational Check of APU, Engine Fire Protection System and Cargo Fire Protection System

Questions.QuestionString: 14. Which power supply to APU Fire Extinguishing Bottle Cartridge? (B1, B2)
Answers: 28VDC EMER HOT Bus 1 to Squib 1, 28VDC EMER HOT Bus 2 to Squib 2
28VDC busbar DC EMER 1 to Squib 1, 28VDC busbar DC EMER 1 to Squib 2
28VDC EMER HOT 1 to Squib 1, 28VDC Normal Bus to Squib 2.
